are smart contracts that extend totem functionality through hooks.      Developers deploy a mod contract, then publish it here with metadata.      The marketplace handles:      - Publishing with validation (name, summary, hooks, etc.)      - Fee collection with referrer support and burn mechanism      - Mod discovery via pagination and batch queries      - Required actions that must be called after totem creation","events":{"ModPublished(address)":{"params":{"mod":"The address of the published mod contract"}},"ModUpdated(address)":{"params":{"mod":"The address of the updated mod contract"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_burnedFee":"Fee amount that is always burned","_minBaseFee":"Minimum base fee for mod publishing"}},"getFee(address)":{"params":{"referrer":"The referrer address (or zero address for no referrer)"},"returns":{"_0":"The total fee required (at least minBaseFee)"}},"getMod(address)":{"params":{"mod":"Mod contract address"},"returns":{"_0":"Mod struct"}},"getModFee(address)":{"params":{"mod":"Mod contract address"},"returns":{"_0":"The price in wei to use this mod"}},"getModRequiredActions(address)":{"params":{"mod":"Mod contract address"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of required actions"}},"getMods(address[])":{"params":{"contracts":"Array of mod contract addresses"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of Mod structs"}},"getModsFee(address[])":{"details":"Useful for calculating total cost when creating a totem with multiple mods","params":{"contracts":"Array of mod contract addresses"},"returns":{"_0":"Total price in wei for all mods combined"}},"getSupportedHooks(address)":{"details":"Hooks determine when the mod is called (Created, Mint, Burn, Transfer, TransferOwnership)","params":{"mod":"Mod contract address"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of Hook enum values"}},"isUnlimitedMinter(address)":{"details":"Mods with needsUnlimited=true can mint tokens without supply cap restrictions. params._burnedFee: Fee amount that is always burned
params._minBaseFee: Minimum base fee for mod publishing

params.referrer: The referrer address (or zero address for no referrer)

returns._0: The total fee required (at least minBaseFee)
The price in wei to use this mod

getModsFee(address[]).details: Useful for calculating total cost when creating a totem with multiple mods

returns._0: Total price in wei for all mods combined

getSupportedHooks(address).details: Hooks determine when the mod is called (Created, Mint, Burn, Transfer, TransferOwnership)

isUnlimitedMinter(address).details: Mods with needsUnlimited=true can mint tokens without supply cap restrictions.      Returns false for unpublished mods.

returns._0: True if the mod needs unlimited minting capability

publish(address,uint8[],uint256,(string,.details: Only the mod's seller (returned by mod.getSeller()) can publish.      Validates: contract exists, not already published, name 3-100 chars,      summary 10-150 chars, image URL present, valid hooks with no duplicates.      Excess payment is refunded to sender.

params.details: Mod display details (name, summary, image, website, etc.)
params.hooks: Array of supported hook identifiers (Created, Mint, Burn, Transfer, TransferOwnership)
params.price: Price in wei to use this mod (paid when totem creator adds the mod)
params.referrer: Optional referrer address (receives fee minus burned amount)
params.requiredActions: Setup actions users must call after totem creation

setReferrerFee(uint256).details: Referrers earn fees when users publish mods using their address.      Fee must be at least minBaseFee. The referrer receives (fee - burnedFee).

params.fee: The fee amount in wei (must be >= minBaseFee)

burnedFee().notice: Fee amount that is always burned (set once in constructor, never changed)

constructor.notice: Deploys the market with the minimum base fee and burned fee

getFee(address).notice: Get the fee for creating a totem or publishing a mod

getMod(address).notice: Get a single mod by address

getModFee(address).notice: Get the usage price for a single mod

getModRequiredActions(address).notice: Get required actions for a mod (setup actions called after totem creation)

getMods(address[]).notice: Get multiple mods by their addresses

getModsFee(address[]).notice: Get the total usage price for multiple mods

getSupportedHooks(address).notice: Get the hooks supported by a mod

isUnlimitedMinter(address).notice: Check if a mod requires unlimited minting capability

minBaseFee().notice: Minimum base fee for mod publishing (set once in constructor, never changed)

modList(uint256).notice: Ordered list of all published mod addresses (for pagination)

publish(address,uint8[],uint256,(string,.notice: Publish a mod to the marketplace

setReferrerFee(uint256).notice: Set your referrer fee for mod publishing

updateRequiredActions(address,(string,(s.notice: Update required actions for a mod
